BackRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy>Some meats you can't buy in a store.
You have to find them for yourself out in
the wild.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>I'm like a treasure hunter, but instead of
precious jewels, I find precious flavors.<sp:5:0:0>
Mezer, the meat hunter!
BackRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy>A <clr:0000>mysterious beast<clr:ffff>... <sp:5:0:0>Mm! I wanna taste
the mystery meat!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>But anyone who dares to take life must
be willing to nurture it too.<sp:0:4:0>If this beast is one of the last of its kind,
then I'm not about to eat it.<sp:0:4:0>We've got to create an environment that
would allow their population to grow
before we even think about that.
BackRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>There's somethin' kinda romantic about
hunting the unknown.<sp:5:0:0> But just what sort
of creature is this <clr:0000>rumored beast<clr:ffff>?
There's so much we don't know. <sp:5:0:0>What
does it look like? <sp:5:0:0>How does it live?<sp:0:4:0>Does it taste better as a skewer, stew,
or roast?<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>No, no, you don't gotta tell me. I know it's
terrible that's where my brain goes.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>If you're going to take life, you need to
be willing to nurture it too.<sp:0:4:0>If this beast's one of the last of its kind,
I'm not about to eat it, no matter how
much I love meat.
<snd:LaughS_01>I'd wanna help build an environment that
would allow it to thrive and reproduce.
Maybe then I'd sample one.
GoRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I've heard every rumor the stables have
to offer, and I'm sure of it—the beast is
here in <clr:0000>Faron<clr:ffff>.
No need to go way out east to <clr:0000>Lurelin <clr:ffff>for
a bite.<sp:5:0:0> That critter's close, and I plan on
cooking it up.
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS>How do I know? Call it intuition.<sp:5:0:0> Or maybe
just my nose for meat!<sp:5:1:0> Either way, I've
got its scent now.
GoRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You might've already picked up on this,
but I love meat.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Used to go around selling it, but every
time I handed it over to a customer,
my stomach growled something fierce.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>That's when I realized I'd rather eat it
than give it away.
RainPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Based solely on the size of the <clr:0000>footprints<clr:ffff>
hanging at the <clr:0000>stables<clr:ffff>...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>this <clr:0000>rumored beast <clr:ffff>has gotta be massive!<sp:0:4:0>Tell ya what—if I find it, I'll split it with
ya. Just make sure you've got room in
your stomach!
Guardian00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Scare>An un-<sp:5:0:0>un-<sp:5:0:0>unknown monster?!<sp:5:1:0> We gotta
run! If we escape with our lives, that's
a win in my book!
SavedLv3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL>That encounter had me shakin' in my
boots.<sp:5:0:0> You're something special if you
can walk away from a fight like that.
Greeting:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>What is it? Ya hungry? Sorry, I don't have
any food on me right now.<sp:0:4:0>I swore to myself that I wouldn't eat a
thing until I dined on that <clr:0000>rumored beast<clr:ffff>
all the stables are talkin' about!
GoRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Steaks, skewers... I want 'em all! <sp:5:0:0>Fish and
veggies may be enough for some, but only
meaty meat satisfies my tummy!
SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Ease>Tha...<sp:5:0:0>that was a real terror.<sp:5:0:0> Figured I was
mincemeat for sure!
Near_GoRange_02: I could go for a steak.
Thanks00:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Thanks to you, my meat-seeking
adventures can continue!

<snd:Happy>This is for you, and don't even try to turn
it down.<sp:5:0:0> Hope you enjoy!
StartPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0401>I just saw a <clr:0000>blue animal<clr:ffff> over there. You
think it's the <clr:0000>rumored beast<clr:ffff> everyone's
goin' on about?
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Nah, can't be.<sp:5:0:0> It's too different from all
the stories.<sp:0:4:0>Still, can't say I've ever seen a creature
quite like it.<sp:0:4:0><snd:LaughS_00>I'd love to get a taste of—<sp:5:1:0> Er, a better
look at it...
SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Ease>Phew...<sp:5:0:0> I love eatin' meat, but I draw the
line at getting eaten.
GoalPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Still...<sp:5:0:0>I don't see any trace of the
<clr:0000>rumored beast <clr:ffff>on the beach.
RestPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you're hungry, it's best to look for a
settlement.<sp:5:1:0> There's <clr:0000>Lurelin Village<clr:ffff> down
the road to the <clr:0000>east<clr:ffff>...
But it's been taken over by pirates. Worse
yet, it's a fishing town!<sp:0:4:0>Full of pirates, no meat...<sp:5:1:0> Yeah, I don't
think <clr:0000>Lurelin<clr:ffff>'s for me.
SavedLv2_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Ease>That was horrifying.<sp:5:0:0> I thought I was
dead meat!
RestPoint_01_3:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you're hungry, finding a settlement's a
quick way to get some good food.<sp:5:1:0> Closest
option's <clr:0000>Lurelin Village<clr:ffff> to the <clr:0000>east<clr:ffff>.
I'm not much of a seafood eater though.
I like my meat meaty.
BackRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>Find meat, eat meat. <sp:5:0:0>That's my
carnivorous credo!
SavedLv1_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Ease>That was dicey.<sp:5:0:0> I thought I was gonna end
up a monster meal!
Failed00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>L-<sp:5:0:0>look at that, I'm saved...<sp:5:0:0>I think?<sp:5:1:0>
Yeah, guess you must've saved me.
SavedLv1_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0201><snd:Angry>I hate monsters.<sp:5:0:0> Bet their meat isn't even
worth cooking.
Failed01: <sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Ease>Thanks...<sp:5:0:0> I almost got chewed up there.
RestPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If I take the road <clr:0000>east<clr:ffff>, I'll come up on
<clr:0000>Lurelin Village<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>No quicker way to get a bite to eat than
finding a settlement, after all.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>But that's a fishing town, and me? <sp:5:0:0>I'm a
meat man!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>On top of that, I heard they got attacked
by <clr:0000>pirates<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:1:0>Yeah, think I'll steer clear.
Atacked00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Scare>H-help!<sp:5:0:0> Don't let 'em eat me! I'm all
gristle, anyway!
RestPoint_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If I take the road <clr:0000>east<clr:ffff>, I'll come up on
<clr:0000>Lurelin Village<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>No quicker way to get a good meal than
finding a settlement, after all.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00>But that's a fishing town, and me? <sp:5:0:0>I'm a
meat man!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001>I heard that the pirates are gone now,
so that's a plus, but...<sp:5:0:0> Maybe there's a
hunting town I can visit instead.
Atacked01: <sp:3:0:2:0900>You gotta be kiddin' me! I<sp:5:1:0> ain't<sp:5:0:0> meat!
StartPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I could've sworn I caught a glimpse of
that <clr:0000>little blue creature<clr:ffff> around here.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>Hm... Hmmm...<sp:0:4:0>Mmm... <sp:5:1:0>Wonder how it tastes.
GoalPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Go to any <clr:0000>stable<clr:ffff> and you'll hear rumors
about a <clr:0000>mysterious beast<clr:ffff>.
GoalPoint_01_3:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If I look at the common threads between
all <clr:0000>stable chatter<clr:ffff> I've heard...<sp:0:4:0>it's clear that the beast's somewhere in
the <clr:0000>Faron<clr:ffff> region.
RainPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Y'know...<sp:5:1:0>whenever the rain puts a damper
on my adventures, my mind always
wanders to what I wanna eat.
You ever get a chance to see the
footprints of the <clr:0000>rumored beast<clr:ffff> in those
<clr:0000>stables<clr:ffff>? The pictures of 'em, I mean.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Anything that leaves tracks like that has
gotta be HUGE.<sp:0:4:0>That's why I'm trying to keep my stomach
nice and empty for it!
FriendGreet_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Huh?<sp:5:0:0> Well, we meet again, friend!<sp:5:0:0> You
really pulled me out of the fire back at
that Goron restaurant.
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Since then, my hunt for this <clr:0000>mysterious<clr:ffff>,
<clr:0000>rumored beast<clr:ffff> has led me down here to
the Faron tropics.
I've been keepin' my ear to the ground in
<clr:0000>stables all across Hyrule<clr:ffff>, and the stories
all point in this direction.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>And when I find that creature, hm...<sp:0:4:0>Do I wanna make a steak out of it or chop
it up for a stew?<sp:5:1:0> Decisions, decisions...
GoRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>I smell it...<sp:5:1:0> *sniff* Yeah, I smell it!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>The <clr:0000>rumored beast <clr:ffff>is close by.<sp:5:0:0> My nose
is never wrong!
